statements: SELECT * FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE location = 'Beach';
SELECT date, location, pollution_level FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution ORDER BY pollution_level ASC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution;
SELECT * FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT location, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE location = 'Beach' GROUP BY location
SELECT date, location, pollution_level FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE pollution_level < 30
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution
SELECT * FROM pollution_data ORDER BY data_collected DESC;
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT id, location, pollution_level, data_collected FROM pollution_data WHERE location = 'River';
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE data_collected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution_level FROM pollution_data;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data ORDER BY data_collected DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, AVG(pollution_level) as avg_pollution_level FROM pollution_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 50;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 100 ORDER BY data_collected LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) as max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) as min_pollution_level FROM pollution_data;
SELECT location, SUM(pollution_level) as total_pollution_level FROM pollution_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_on_marine_life;
SELECT species, location, impact_type FROM impact_on_marine_life;
SELECT id, impact_type, impact_description FROM impact_on_marine_life;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data;
SELECT date, location, plastic_type, quantity FROM pollution_data;
SELECT * FROM impact_on_marine_life WHERE impact_type = 'Chemical' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT species, location, impact_description FROM impact_on_marine_life WHERE species = 'Whale' AND impact_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT researcher_name, research_area, affiliation, COUNT(researcher_name) AS research_count FROM research_team GROUP BY researcher_name ORDER BY research_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location, date DESC;
SELECT id, species, location, impact_type FROM impact_on_marine_life WHERE species IN ('Dolphin', 'Turtle') AND impact_type IN ('Oil', 'Garbage') ORDER BY location ASC, impact_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM Plastic_Pollution;
SELECT location, impact_description FROM Plastic_Pollution;
SELECT id, date, location FROM Plastic_Pollution WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Marine_Life ORDER BY species DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study, experience_years FROM Research_Team WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM Plastic_Pollution WHERE location = 'Pacific Ocean'
SELECT id, location FROM Plastic_Pollution WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM Marine_Life WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY population DESC
SELECT id, species, reproduction_rate FROM Marine_Life WHERE reproduction_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5
SELECT id, researcher_name, field_of_study FROM Research_Team WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY experience_years
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_study LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, date_observed FROM plastic_pollution_study WHERE plastic_items_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM marine_species ORDER BY average_lifespan DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM marine_species WHERE habitat='Coral Reef';
SELECT team_name, lead_researcher FROM research_team WHERE research_institution='Oceanographic Institute';
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_study ORDER BY date_observed DESC, location ASC
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM marine_species WHERE average_lifespan > 10
SELECT source_name, region, impact_description FROM pollution_sources WHERE region = 'Pacific Ocean'
SELECT team_name, lead_researcher, research_institution FROM research_team WHERE research_institution LIKE '%University%'
SELECT * FROM observation_results WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY observation_date DESC
